channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Turkish Tufts University student back in Boston after release from Louisiana detention center
item.description: A Tufts University student from Turkey has returned to Boston after being released from a Louisiana immigration detention center.

item.title: Economic jitters and soaring gold prices create a frenzy for US jewelry merchants
A split jury and a lie sent him to prison. Now he’s working to change Louisiana’s law
